name: Move and Hide
description:
Controls:

  • Move - WASD 
  • Wait a turn - Space

A little story behind the game

I had a lot of trouble with this theme so I made the first idea that came to mind. I chose turn-based stealth game and after a day I realised that it’s not really incompatible, but by this point I could’t start working on something new.

You don’t really have any big goals in this game. The main goal is to get to the door on the other side of the level and that’s it.

This game was more like a challange to finish the game more than make the game super good with audio and good graphics. It’s something that I can always look down to and tell my self let’s do better this time…

Even though the game is quite small I still hope you’re gonna enjoy my 3 level’s filled of bugs.
